import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Button, Checkbox, Form } from 'semantic-ui-react' import axios from 'axios'; export default function Create() { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(''); const [originalPrice, setOriginalPrice] = useState(''); const [price, setPrice] = useState(''); const [description, setDescription] = useState(''); const [timeCreate, setTimeCreate] = useState(''); const [status, setStatus] = useState(''); const [viewCount, setViewCount] = useState(''); const [details, setDetails] = useState(''); const [thumbnailImage, setThumbnailImage] = useState(''); const postData = async () => { await axios.post("https://localhost:5000/api/Products", { name, quantity, originalPrice, price, description, timeCreate, status, viewCount, details, thumbnailImage }) } return (
setName(e.target.value)}/> setQuantity(e.target.value)}/> setOriginalPrice(e.target.value)}/> setPrice(e.target.value)}/> setDescription(e.target.value)}/> setTimeCreate(e.target.value)}/> setStatus(e.target.value)}/> setViewCount(e.target.value)}/> setDetails(e.target.value)}/> setThumbnailImage(e.target.value)}/>
) }
